name: King's Snickers
description:
My first game on Unity. This is a tribute to an excellent game : King's Bounty (the one on Megadrive).

You play as a knight and expand your army to defeat monsters and find the King's Snickers!

This game was created for the  Honest Jam #1

(game isn't finished at all)

Credits: 

roguelike icons: https://twitter.com/JoeCreates

towns and castles : Buch --> http://blog-buch.rhcloud.com,  Jeffrey Kern as the committer and creative consultant

Tilemap: https://opengameart.org/content/zelda-like-tilesets-and-sprites

Golds: Bonsaiheldin | https://opengameart.org/content/gold-treasure-icons-16x16

Dialog box: https://narehop.itch.io/rpg-gui-asset-pack

vehicles:  DualR at https://opengameart.org/content/16x16-fantasy-pixel-art-vehicles 

Chest:

monsters: calciumtrice.tumblr.com.

king: https://opengameart.org/content/a-platformer-in-the-forest

fish: https://twitter.com/rapidpunches
